authors.name: Jesus Guzman
authors.bio: Jesus Guzman is an award-winning financial journalist with over 12 years of experience covering global markets, economic policy, and investment strategies.
authors.title: Senior Financial Reporter

pressReleases.about: FNPulse is a leading global provider of financial news, market data, and intelligence solutions. Founded in 2020, the company serves financial professionals, institutional investors, traders, and journalists across 45 countries.
